    Blood pressure control, JNC7 definition

    bp_control_jnc7.Rmd

    BP control (JNC7 BP guideline definition)

    According to the FILL IN, BP control is defined as having systolic BP < 140 mm Hg and diastolic BP < 90 mm Hg.

    Proportion with BP control by calendar year.

    Proportion with BP control by age group in 2017-2020.

    Proportion with BP control by sex in 2017-2020.

    Proportion with BP control by race/ethnicity in 2017-2020.
